Text: SeeI do work for Cox Barbara Waldrop Business Manager Cox RadioHouston Post Oak Blvd Ste Houston TX fax

RE Seeglad that I received that email I have been waiting on pins and needles for a meaningful and heartfelt messageoh well maybe next time Just kidding How is your day going I actually slept good last night Isnt amazing what a good nights sleep can do for you Maybe the anxiety is going away Sophie actually let me sleep until am and then she couldnt hold it anymore Gosh I just love having a dog that is years old Had a Drs appt this morning and just got back from and Im trying to get back into work Why cant we all just be selfmade millionaires and get to play all day Any word from David Original Message From mailto Sent Monday February AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Re See Testing Testing This is a test of the Waldrop email systems This is only a test If this were a real email there would be a much more meaningful and heartfelt message contained herein Waldrop Barbara To CBIHouston cc BarbaraWaldro Subject See AM See I do work for Cox Barbara Waldrop Business Manager Cox RadioHouston Post Oak Blvd Ste Houston TX fax

FW Come on feel the noiseyou would like to see the cool yours truly with Quiet Riot I am thinking about joining the band Original Message From Wright Clint CBIHouston Sent Tuesday March AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Come on feel the noise barbara and quiet riotjpg Clint Wright Promotion Director The Point KHPT Hot KTHT Post Oak Blvd Suite Houston TX barbara and quiet riotjpg

FW SMILEI would send you these pictures The first one was taken by surprise and then I thought I would actually pose for the second one They were walking around taking pictures for some unknown reason and then they sent them to me I know its not as cool as the Quiet Riot picture but then againany picture with me in it is coolRight Original Message From Mazzini Remo CBIHouston Sent Thursday March AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject SMILE MVCSJPG MVCSJPG Remo Mazzini Q Promotion Coordinator office cell fax MVCSJPG MVCSJPG

FW Moving Thoughts Words of Wisdomis what Scott sent to Renee She is trying to figure out if he only sent it to her or others Original Message From Renee Remillard mailto Sent Tuesday March AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject FW Moving Thoughts Words of Wisdom Original Message From Incognito Scott J mailto Sent Monday March PM Subject FW Moving Thoughts Words of Wisdom Perhaps this is a little too nice for me Moving Thoughts imagesbearredjpg Maybe God wants us to meet a few wrong people before meeting the right one so that when we finally meet the right person we will know how to be grateful for that gift When the door of happiness closes another opens but often times we look so long at the closed door that we dont see the one which has been opened for us The best kind of friend is the kind you can sit on a porch and swing with never say a word and then walk away feeling like it was the best conversation youve ever had Its true that we dont know what weve got until we lose it but its also true that we dont know what weve been missing until it arrives Giving someone all your love is never an assurance that theyll love you back Dont expect love in return just wait for it to grow in their heart but if it doesnt be content it grew in yours It takes only a minute to get a crush on someone an hour to like someone and a day to love someone but it takes a lifetime to forget someone Dont go for looks they can deceive Dont go for wealth even that fades away Go for someone who makes you smile because it takes only a smile to make a dark day seem bright Find the one that makes your heart smile There are moments in life when you miss someone so much that you just want to pick them from your dreams and hug them for real Dream what you want to dream go where you want to go be what you want to be because you have only one life and one chance to do all the things you want to do May you have enough happiness to make you sweet enough trials to make you strong enough sorrow to keep you human enough hope to make you happy Always put yourself in others shoes If you feel that it hurts you it probably hurts the other person too The happiest of people dont necessarily have the best of everything they just make the most of everything that comes along their way Happiness lies for those who cry those who hurt those who have searched and those who have tried for only they can appreciate the importance of people who have touched their lives Love begins with a smile grows with a kiss and ends with a tear The brightest future will always be based on a forgotten past you cant go on well in life until you let go of your past failures and heartaches When you were born you were crying and everyone around you was smiling Live your life so that when you die youre the one who is smiling and everyone around you is crying Please send this message to those people who mean something to you to those who have touched your life in one way or another to those who make you smile when you really need it to those that make you see the brighter side of things when you are really down to those who you want to let them know that you appreciate their friendship And if you dont dont worry nothing bad will happen to you you will just miss out on the opportunity to brighten someones day with this message

FW Easter Egg decorating contestyou help me decorate an egg By the way have you seen my watch laying around your house I am thinking that I left it over there Sunday night Thanks Original Message From Sachan Kim CBIHouston Sent Tuesday April PM To Sachan Kim CBIHouston Subject Easter Egg decorating contest Okay we have decided to have an EASTER EGG decorating contest You decorate your own egg dont go buy a decorated one Judging will be at the BBQ prizes will be won st nd and rd place honors So be creative Kim Sachan Office HR Manager Cox Radio Houston KHPTKKBQKLDEKTHT Direct Fax

RE FW Easter Egg decorating contestam so glad that I could help you have a good time last night I may have not been there in person but I was certainly there in thoughtHow can I screw over Barbara Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Re FW Easter Egg decorating contest Eggcellent Yes I did have your watch However due to lean times on the Nemec ranch I was forced to see what the cash equivalent of your watch would be Does sound fair Anyway I took the ten bucks which thankfully acounted for both my beers last night Chalk up another one to the Nemec leisure activity fund Waldrop Barbara To CBIHouston cc BarbaraWaldro Subject FW Easter Egg decorating contest PM Will you help me decorate an egg By the way have you seen my watch laying around your house I am thinking that I left it over there Sunday night Thanks Original Message From Sachan Kim CBIHouston Sent Tuesday April PM To Sachan Kim CBIHouston Subject Easter Egg decorating contest Okay we have decided to have an EASTER EGG decorating contest You decorate your own egg dont go buy a decorated one Judging will be at the BBQ prizes will be won st nd and rd place honors So be creative Kim Sachan Office HR Manager Cox Radio Houston KHPTKKBQKLDEKTHT Direct Fax

FW Bootcamp is my bootcamp class Thought you could print this up and frame it I know that you are so proud to be dating someone in this picture Original Message From Sean Conner mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Bootcamp Hi team Enjoy the photosHooyah Sean Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at bootcampJPG

FW Fortune cookieof makes you wonder Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April AM To Subject Fortune cookie considering our conversation last night about China I thought youd appreciateha ha ha just dont ask about what you are eating Forwarded by Suzanne M BennettHOUDynegy on AM See attached file fortunejpg fortunejpg

FW Read Storyline firstFwd Read Storyline first Another one of those good ideas at the time This is hilarious A class of elementary students wanted to make a planter to take home and wanted to have a plant that was easy to take care of in it so it was decided to use cactus plants The students planted the cactus seeds in the planters and they grew nicely but unfortunately were not allowed to take them home See attachment to see why The cactus plants were removed and a small ivy replaced them and the children were then allowed to take them home It seemed like a good idea at the timejpg See attached file It seemed like a good idea at the timejpg It seemed like a good idea at the timejpg
FW This is SO awesomeyou would enjoy this one Girls Are Eviljpg

FW Happy Hour Tomorrow Nightis the information that I sent out to everyone at work about the Club Monkey Happy Hour tomorrow night Let me know if you are planning on stopping by Thought it might be kind of easy for yall since it is already downtown Original Message From Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Sent Thursday May PM To Sandra Velasco Email Email Gleeson Sonia CBIHouston Sherman Monica CBIHouston Michele Trimm Email Email Brett Thiery Email Charles Phifer CBIHouston Email Christi Aubry CBIHouston Email Doug Abernethy Email Heather Walters Email Jack Fauntleroy CBIHouston Email Jamie Martin CBIHouston Email Jeff Thompson Email Johnny Chiang Email Email Judy Lakin CBIHouston Email Laura Van Dinter CBIHouston Email Libby Long Email Micah Goldberg CBIHouston Email Michael Cody CBIHouston Email Michelle Lauret CBIHouston Email Renee Remillard Email Rick OBryan Email Subject Happy Hour Tomorrow Night Just wanted everyone to know that Club Monkey that is the organization that we play softball through is throwing a Happy Hour at Have a Nice Day Cafe tomorrow night Good reason to go and support Joels club too Here are the details Friday May th Time pm at the door Includes All the beer you want TWO twist cokctails of your choice plus drink specials all night long Also Cafe will open the doors into Bar Houston at Your cover to Bar Houston is free if you are at Cafe during that time Call me with any questions Barbara Waldrop Business Manager Cox RadioHouston Post Oak Blvd Ste Houston TX fax

FW Just a tip You forward emails excessivelyyou might enjoy this website You need to go to the website and then choose to send your own tip and it gives you all the funny ones that you can send Original Message From Van Dinter Laura CBIHouston Sent Monday May PM To Martin Jamie CBIHouston long Libby CBIHouston Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Coates Casey CBIHouston Cody Michael CBIHouston Subject FW Just a tip You forward emails excessively IF YOU HAVE A PROBLEM WITH ITTELL ME YOU PIECE OF HA HA HA Original Message From Just a Tip mailto Sent Monday May PM To Van Dinter Laura CBIHouston Subject Just a tip You forward emails excessively Just a Tip lets you know if your friends have a problem with you Unfortunately someone has asked us to tell you that you forward emails excessively To see their specific comments and the solutions we suggest go to notifyviewaspNotifyIDVerify
Methought you would enjoy this pictureI think I really like the one on my left Look how fir he is MVCSJPG Barbara Waldrop Business Manager Cox RadioHouston Post Oak Blvd Ste Houston TX fax MVCSJPG

FWMessage From mailto Sent Friday May PM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Fwd MessageID fceaffdcfa koger From To FREDLAOLCOM OLCOM NASCARAOLCOM Subject Date Fri May MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartCECCBEF Our perfect baby Rylyn Breck Koger Back to see Momma J Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg

FW Fwd no subjectin case you were thinking about doing this Ten Reasons To Go To Work Naked No one ever steals your chair Gives bad hair day a whole new meaning Diverts attention from the fact that you also came to work drunk People stop stealing your pens after theyve seen where you keep them You want to see if its like the dream To stop those creepy programmer guys from looking down your blouse Id love to chip in but I left my wallet in my pants Inventive way to finally meet that special person in Human Resources Can take advantage of your computer monitor radiation to work on your tan Anddrum rollthe Number One reason to go to work naked Your boss will never say I wanna see your ass in here by ever again

FWNonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Cruise Michael CBIHouston Sent Friday July PM To Johnny Chiang Email Aubry Christi CBIHouston Jones Judi CBIHouston Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject The Perfect Couple Once upon a time a perfect man and a perfect woman met After a perfect courtship they had a perfect wedding Their life together was of course perfect One snowy stormy Christmas Eve this perfect couple was driving their perfect car a Grand Caravan along a winding road when they noticed someone at the side of the road in distress Being the perfect couple they stopped to help There stood Santa Claus with a huge bundle of toys Not wanting to disappoint any children on the eve of Christmas the perfect couple loaded Santa and his toys into their vehicle Soon they were driving along delivering toys Unfortunately the driving conditions deteriorated and the perfect couple and Santa Claus had an accident Only one of them survived the accident The mind numbing question is Who was the survivor Scroll down for the answer The perfect woman survived Shes the only one who really existed in the first place Everyone knows there is no Santa Claus and there is no such thing as a perfect man Women stop reading here That is the end of the joke Men keepa scrollin So if there is no perfect man and no Santa Claus the perfect woman must have been driving And that explains why there was a car accident By the way if youre a woman and youre reading this this illustrates another point Women never listen either Michael Cruise Program Director KKBQ The New Q Cox RadioHouston wwwthenewqcom

FWNonPrivilegedpst I used to send you pictures of me and different bands Do you remember that band Wang Chung Here you go Original Message From Johnny Chiang mailto Sent Tuesday August AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Johnny Chiang Program Director KHPTFM Houston wwwthepointcom AOL IM jckost Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger Me and Barbarajpg Me and Barbara jpg

FWNonPrivilegedpst Thought that was funny to send to you Actually we had that picture taken todaywe are dressed identical Sad news Judis mother passed away this weekend and I am planning on attending the funeral later on today Original Message From Johnny Chiang mailto Sent Tuesday August AM To Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject Johnny Chiang Program Director KHPTFM Houston wwwthepointcom AOL IM jckost Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

FW Houston TunnelsNonPrivilegedpst Did not know if anyone had sent you pictures of the tunnels downtown Absolutely incredible Original Message From Teresa J Waldrop mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Rachel Ziolkowski Jeff Wagner ckoger Barbara S Waldrop Subject Fw Houston Tunnels Original Message From David E Frels To Teresa J Waldrop Sherri Young Lynda Hale Jeremy Dicks Jeff Hogan Curtis Ardoin Cleo J Longoria Barbara Collins Sent Wednesday June AM Subject Fw Houston Tunnels Original Message From Garcia Richard To Anthony Tropeano Email Chris Boland Email David Frels Email Emily Schultze Email Glenn Brosch Email aradigmGeocom Sam Schultze Email Sent Wednesday June AM Subject FW Houston Tunnels Original Message From Graf Kristina Sent Tuesday June AM To Houston Office Subject FW Houston Tunnels Thought you might be interested in these pictures of the tunnel downtown Original Message From Sharon K Bourne mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Kristina Graf Subject Fw Houston Tunnels Here ya go MVCJPG MVCJPG MVCJPG MVCJPG

Waldrop Barbara CBIHouston Subject FW Moving Thoughts Words of Wisdom Original Message From Incognito Scott J mailto Sent Monday March PM Subject FW Moving Thoughts Words of Wisdom Perhaps this is a little too nice for me Moving Thoughts imagesbearredjpg Maybe God wants us to meet a few wrong people before meeting the right one so that when we finally meet the right person we will know how to be grateful for that gift When the door of happiness closes another opens but often times we look so long at the closed door that we dont see the one which has been opened for us The best kind of friend is the kind you can sit on a porch and swing with never say a word and then walk away feeling like it was the best conversation youve ever had Its true that we dont know what weve got until we lose it but its also true that we dont know what weve been missing until it arrives Giving someone all your love is never an assurance that theyll love you back Dont expect love in return just wait for it to grow in their heart but if it doesnt be content it grew in yours It takes only a minute to get a crush on someone an hour to like someone and a day to love someone but it takes a lifetime to forget someone Dont go for looks they can deceive Dont go for wealth even that fades away Go for someone who makes you smile because it takes only a smile to make a dark day seem bright Find the one that makes your heart smile There are moments in life when you miss someone so much that you just want to pick them from your dreams and hug them for real Dream what you want to dream go where you want to go be what you want to be because you have only one life and one chance to do all the things you want to do May you have enough happiness to make you sweet enough trials to make you strong enough sorrow to keep you human enough hope to make you happy Always put yourself in others shoes If you feel that it hurts you it probably hurts the other person too The happiest of people dont necessarily have the best of everything they just make the most of everything that comes along their way Happiness lies for those who cry those who hurt those who have searched and those who have tried for only they can appreciate the importance of people who have touched their lives Love begins with a smile grows with a kiss and ends with a tear The brightest future will always be based on a forgotten past you cant go on well in life until you let go of your past failures and heartaches When you were born you were crying and everyone around you was smiling Live your life so that when you die youre the one who is smiling and everyone around you is crying Please send this message to those people who mean something to you to those who have touched your life in one way or another to those who make you smile when you really need it to those that make you see the brighter side of things when you are really down to those who you want to let them know that you appreciate their friendship And if you dont dont worry nothing bad will happen to you you will just miss out on the opportunity to brighten someones day with this message
